General.Name: Formosa Petrochemical Corp
General.Description: Formosa Petrochemical Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the petrochemical and public utility businesses in Taiwan, Korea, the Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, Mainland China, and internationally. The company produces and sells petroleum and petrochemical products; and water, electricity, and steam. Its products include gasoline, diesel, liquefied petroleum gas, jet fuel/kerosene, naphtha, petrochemical raw material, fuel oil/asphalt/sulphur, base oil, and lubricants. The company is also involved in the exploration and production of oil and gas; leasing of ships; and investing activities, as well as provision of transportation services. Formosa Petrochemical Corporation was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Mailiao, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1-1, Taisu Industrial Park, Mailiao, Taiwan, 638
